wikipedia_page.main: Thomas John Hearne (3 July 1887 – 25 May 1947) was an English first-class cricketer who played one match for Middlesex, in which he did not bat or bowl.

response: * Thomas John Hearne (1887–1947), son of George Francis Hearne, grandson of Thomas Hearne, played for Middlesex (1908) and Berkshire
